name: Hero Survival (Flyber)
description:
Hero Survival is a game with a concept of being simple and addictive, game developed exclusively for INTERNET GAME JAM 2022.

With the aim of creating something that is not only simple but fun, I embarked on this journey, every project was done in unity, I decided to go on this journey learning the Visual Scripting Graph of unity (every game was developed using it), and taking it as a learning experience for future projects.

The game is simple, just eliminate your enemies and pass the level and get high scores. With a complex system of variables, the player gains various bonuses when leveling up, such as Health and Attack Damage, and even a Chest Drop, is left on the map and an indicator shows where he is, the Drop Chest, gives you random benefits based on player level, the order of probability is: Health > XP > Weapon Upgrade > Fireballs. There are 6 different Weapons in the game, what changes between them is the type of attack, this impacts the player's gameplay.

My name is Jefesson Nunes, I'm 25 years old and I live in the countryside of Brazil, I currently work as Graphic Designer, I started in the game world more than 7 years ago of learning and projects, I want to work only in game development and new technologies because it's that I love to do, this game jam for me is a great opportunity.
